com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase
Class MetadataCache

java.lang.Object
  com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.MetadataCache

@ThreadSafe
public class MetadataCache
extends Object

Caches metadata about tables to reduce HBase lookups.
